name: Libby Hardel
text: Probably the best pizza I've ever had. They make it to order and they understand when you ask for an ingredient to be "light" as 8n "light cheese". I'm lactose intolerant but, with medicine, I can take SOME cheese and they always put the …More

name: iFraggerz
text: The pizza is fresh and great I love the fact you can make your own pizza

name: Jaime Bibian
text: Place is clean. Fast service for a shareable thin pizza. Fresh dough made in house never frozen. A hungry guy (me) can eat one alone. Blood orange lemonade is awesome! Great drink options away from soda

name: Ashton Cooper
text: The best place to eat a personal size pizza! I’ve tried different pizza places, but what really made Blaze in oak lawn a totally different experience for me was the warm welcome entering the restaurant and when making the pizza down the …More

name: عاكس خط
text: Great service. Delicious pizza ever in US land . Hurry up and get it before it's done

name: Jen Stoltz
text: Love this place! Always fast and fresh ingredients. And you can see all ingredients in front of you. Like that is different than the normal pizza. People are very pleasant too. Prices vary reasonable as well

name: chrissy garmon
text: I love Blaze because their toppings are always so fresh and delicious and the pizzas are cooked to perfection! I always request either Jordan or Jeanette to make my pizzas, they are always so pleasant and helpful! Keep up the good job!

name: Allie Gillespie
text: This is the best Blaze Pizza I have ever been to. The pizza is always perfectly cooked to give the crust a bit of a crunch but never over cooked or burnt as many other Blaze pizzas typically do. But here they cook it perfectly every time. The staff is always friendly and is always kept clean.

name: Tony S
text: The staff here go above and beyond to make sure everything is just right! So very friendly. And of course the pizza is outstanding. I went here with my family, 8 of us in total, and they moved us through the line efficiently. I definitely recommend this place!

name: Peggy Zabicki
text: Wonderfully thin and crispy crust.  Pizzas are baked in a flaming hot, open oven. You can fold a slice like a New York style pizza.  Fresh ingredients of your choice.  Variety of salad options.  Free refills on drinks.  Lovely desserts.  Friendly and helpful staff.  You simply must visit Blaze!

name: Andrew Trovato
text: Service was excellent. Staff is very helpful to new customers. Ingredients are all fresh. Food was significantly better than expected. They have a few pre designed pizzas otherwise you can add whatever toppings you want if they carry it.

name: Tarsha Herron
text: The food is delicious!! Great staff and customer service.  The manager was very accommodating since they had to throw away lettuce due to a recall.. everyone one was with a smile and very helpful.  They'll be seeing me and the family at least once a week...

name: Michelle Gaither
text: Love that you can still enjoy pizza on a plant-based diet. Build your own pizza is what's up!

name: Tatiana Mack
text: I loved this pizza. It was my first time trying it and I loved making a pizza my own way without the extra fees for every extra topping

name: Daniel Panek
text: Food tastes great. Made quickly. Pretty reasonably priced. You choose a bread, sauce, cheese and toppings.

name: Gordon Gekko
text: Personal pizza made to order assembly line style baked to demand.Freakin delicious. Paired well with some Banana Sorbet weed I had.

name: M Vhyde
text: Pizza is delicious when eaten in the restaurant. But you should bring an insulated bag if you are taking it home. The location is good for small groups 3-5 people but I haven't been there when the patio is open.

name: natasha stewart
text: My daughter and I loved the warm and customer service friendly envoirment...... Each employee greeted us made our gluten vegan pizza and it was delicious..... W will be sharing the news and coming back

name: Brian Thomas
text: Amazing concept! Great good delivered very quickly. I liked how good it tasted, but took only five minutes to get.

name: Stephanie Hennelly
text: E-coli poisoning from their pizza in two people I know after eating here this week. Someone isn't taking their health code responsibilities seriously here and I can't recommended them anymore. It's a shame since I really liked their pizza.

name: Sean B
text: Staff is always fast and helpful. Decent food and atmosphere. I like that you can put whatever you want on the pizza...its like the Subway of pizza places.

name: Gina Cross
text: Awesome restaurant! Great food, staff very friendly and professional. I love that the Manager Mrs. Lowe works with the staff when it gets busy.

name: Gia Davenport
text: Great Customer service from beginning to end. This was my first visit and I already can't wait to go back. I loved the idea of choosing my own toppings and the prices are very reasonable. The pizza smelled amazing and tasted even better. The staff was very nice and personable, which made for an overall pleasant experience.

name: Lauren S.
text: My first experience was great! I am finally able to eat pizza with their gluten free dough and vegan cheese options. I really enjoyed my pizza, I just wish they weren't so stingy on their toppings. I ordered spinach on my pizza and didn't see any but, it was still delicious!

name: Carol Newman
text: I like this restaurant. Decent food and atmosphere. Staff is always fast and helpful.

name: Mohammad Zamat
text: Awesome taste but if I'm paying 10 dollars for a pizza I should be able to feed at least 2 people. Again taste is great but only feeds one person

name: gabrielle upton
text: This pizza place has been here for a while but I finally went it and it is amazing. I especially love their build your own pizza. The only thing they can do to improve the experience is perhaps cook the pizza a little while longer. Otherwise i am a new huge fan!

name: Elizabeth W
text: The customer service here was superb! They were genuinely nice compared to other Blaze pizzas in which the employees are cold and don’t care about how they treat the customer. The woman making my pizza cracked jokes and was very sweet and …More

name: Burnett Baker
text: Really loved building my own pizza. It was delicious can't wait to go back. Price was excellent and the lemonade very good. The pesto olive oil finish is crack in a bottle I just wanted to drink it lol very good place I would eat there every day if I lived closer

name: Irma zaborowski
text: Great place amazing customer service delicious food

name: Ruby Frazier
text: Fast service great food friendly staff clean & neat affordable

name: Laura B.
text: It's a fun place to make your our pizza. The ingredients are fresh, the atmosphere of the restaurant is relaxing, and somewhat homey. Really nice place eat alone or with someone. Definitely worth a trip!

name: Angelica Miguel
text: Excellent customer service. Super impressed! I was helped by three employees and they were all so helpful! Jennifer was super helpful!!!

name: Lisa Nash
text: I love Blaze Pizza the concept is so unique, the taste of the pizza isn't comparable to many places!  The service and affordability can't be matched!!

name: Trish Del Longo
text: Decent, but nowhere near the quality of the blaze in downtown New Orleans, where I first found them.  This one in Oak lawn was super floppy, greasy, and the brownie tastes stale and a little burnt.

name: Jazmin Garcia
text: Food was good, the place was clean and the employees were very nice

name: SONNIE SANDERS
text: Just got BLAZED. It was amazing. Packed full of flavor. My choosing of all my favorite ingredients for my favorite price -Cheap. Definitely a must try for those who haven't. A twist on the HotNReady because they are just as fast. Everything is fresh. Welcoming employees. Clean environment.

name: Adam Rasmussen
text: I guess you should call ahead to see if they carry basic pizza ingredients.  Crap pizza too, yuck.

name: Code With Me
text: We really enjoyed our first visit to Blaze Pizza. We came here specifically for their gluten free non dairy cheese pizza for our kids with food allergies and were impressed with the glove changing, separate cooking pad and sauce. One of the …More

name: Peter Majerczak
text: Awesome..non greasy pizza.  The crust is great , my new favorite pizza place

name: Taleia Bowers
text: Very delicious food and friendly service.

name: L J
text: Great place for gluten free dairy diets. I LOVE IT!!!!

name: John Preto
text: Staff so friendly every time we come. My youngest is a talker, and they listen gently and remember his name! It makes his day!

name: Megan Tempinski
text: Love the pizza! Great place to get personal pizza's while on lunch. The wait for the pizza to cook is short about 5 minutes at max. only problem is parking there's not enough!

name: Alvin Carter
text: The concept is great but the pizza was overcooked...

name: Edith Perez

text: My love of this place!!!! It is so awesome that you can fix your pizza however you want and the products are fresh is soooo delicious. Ate it so fast forgot to take pic. 😜

text: I love blaze pizza. Pizza how you want it and quickly! What more can I say!?!

name: Alex C
text: Awesome pizza here! It's more like Italian style pizza so it's not thick but trust me, you'll love it. They have their own pizza creations on the menu or you can add your own toppings. Pizzas take about 5-10 minutes so they're ready quick. …More

name: Sandra Collins
text: I just love it!

name: Sam Raz
text: Amazing customer service, the people there were very welcoming and professional. I was shown all my options and each was explained,  no disrespect or rudeness or any negativity was shown. The food was amazing, delicious and honestly I feel like it's one of the healthiest pizzas I've ever had.

text: This was one of the best blaze expieriences I’ve ever had, the staff was friendly!

text: They burned my pizza, obv didnt realise till i got home so cudnt even eat it.. oh the dissappoinment, i cause i do like blaze normally..😔

name: Erika bridges

name: Shammon Jackson
text: This pizza is so good! I had the Bbq Chicken pizza and it was amazing. I would most def come back here again. The staff is very friendly, the whole decor of the restaurant is nice. Also not to mention that its not that long of a wait.

text: Good Pizzas, very fast and fresh. Friendly people

name: artie pastore
text: Love this place! Hard to resist over eating. The staff is great super friendly and helpful. The vegan cheese is also worth going for, haven't had one that high of quality before!

name: Carlos Delamora
text: I really enjoy it  and nice people there

name: Adrian Martinez
text: I really recommend everyone to go back! I remember last time I was there I said my order to a girl named Izzy and she greeted me to kindly and gave me the best customer service ever! Next time I go there I'm going to give her a big ass tip!

name: Joyce Smith
text: My husband and I both love Blaze Pizza. We especially like the Build Your Own Pizza option. The food and service is always good. The only minus from today's  visit was the gentlemen cooking the pizza.  He was sagging (showing black unwear) and chewing on a straw. Not appealing at all.

name: belinda foster
text: Average, other places with better pizza.

name: sangeet shah
text: Huge shout out to the manager of this place that was working 8/10/17 and his team. Our group had about 15 people that walked in last minute and these guys couldn't of been nicer. It was the first time for most of our group had been to a chipotle-like pizza place and everyone was extremely pleasant to deal with! Thank you!

text: The pizza was good when I first got it 😃but after 5 min the pizza tasted horrible🤢I had the BBQ Chicken Pizza...barely any BBQ sauce drizzle, so pizza was very dry, chicken did not taste like real chicken!! The other pizza the mushrooms were hard and dry😖

text: Employees were super friendly, service was fast, and pizza was tasty as always!! Loved their selection of drinks as well. Try the matcha mixed with blueberry!
